::: {#hero-heading}

Wang X's research interests focus on the fields of microbiology and immunology, specifically examining proteins and interactions related to *Trypanosomes*. He is currently enrolled in the School of Life Sciences at Sun Yat-sen University.

- In 2022, awarded the Academic and Scientific Achievement Award by Southwest University
- During undergraduate studies, received the university-level Second-Class Scholarship and Third-Class Scholarship
- Honored by the Communist Youth League of Southwest University for participation in the “Three Rural Areas” outreach program; awarded Second Prize in Social Practice by the College of Veterinary Medicine, Southwest University

## Background

- Sep 2025–present: Department of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology, School of Life Sciences, Sun Yat-sen University(Guangzhou)
- Sep 2020–June 2025: College of Veterinary Medicine, Southwest University(Chongqing)
:::
